mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_bpal_calc_stnd.select */ SELECT sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt_fr /* age_ycnt_fr 나이_년수_FROM numeric */ ,age_ycnt_to /* age_ycnt_to 나이_년수_TO numeric */ ,calc_frml /* calc_frml 계산_식 character varying(2000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_bpal_calc_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt_fr = #{ageYcntFr} /* age_ycnt_fr 나이_년수_FROM numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_bpal_calc_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_bpal_calc_stnd ( sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt_fr /* age_ycnt_fr 나이_년수_FROM numeric */ ,age_ycnt_to /* age_ycnt_to 나이_년수_TO numeric */
,calc_frml /* calc_frml 계산_식 character varying(2000) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageYcntFr} /* age_ycnt_fr 나이_년수_FROM numeric */ ,#{ageYcntTo} /* age_ycnt_to 나이_년수_TO numeric */
,#{calcFrml} /* calc_frml 계산_식 character varying(2000) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_bpal_calc_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_bpal_calc_stnd
,age_ycnt_to = #{ageYcntTo} /* age_ycnt_to 나이_년수_TO numeric */
,calc_frml = #{calcFrml} /* calc_frml 계산_식 character varying(2000) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt_fr = #{ageYcntFr} /* age_ycnt_fr 나이_년수_FROM numeric */
